main event: A UFO sighting was reported at Langley AFB, Virginia, involving a round object observed from the ground for 1.5 hours.
interesting points: The object was observed stationary and did not appear or disappear during the observation,The observers utilized 7 x 50 power binoculars for clearer visibility,The sighting occurred early in the twilight hours, with a bright full moon also visible,Three military personnel were involved in the observation, and one observer likened the object to the 'morning star', suggesting it could be the planet Venus.
sighted object: one round object emitting a bright white light
witness description: Captain T. E. Cauley, Jr. (USAF), E-5 Shoe (USCG), E-3 Stompmaker (USCG)
